channel.title: Help with be greatly appreciate it
channel.description: I'm working on Project's LTM source aka Jspeced v4. And the Dragon Claws can only be wielded by donators? Does anyone know how to change the rights of the weapon. Is the same problems with GS + It might be simple but I really don't know this. Any help will be greatly appreciate it. Thank you.

item.title: Help with be greatly appreciate it
item.dc:creator: @Imaginary Imaginary
item.description:
@Imaginary wrote:

That’s what I thought.
Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with be greatly appreciate it

item.title: Help with be greatly appreciate it

item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[quote=“Imaginary, post:3, topic:350155”]Am I suppose to delete

if(wearID == XXXX && (donator != 1)) { // by Owner Bashar sM("You Need To Be A Donator To Wear This Item."); return false; }[/quote]
oops, yeah u are.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with be greatly appreciate it

item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

if(wearID == XXXX && (donator != 1)) { // by Owner Bashar sM("You Need To Be A Donator To Wear This Item."); return false; }

just change XXXX to item id, simple
